Summaries.eng: Continues the relaxed and funny styles of "Bear Infested" and "Bear Infested Jungle Story", telling the story of two bears-Xiong Da and Xiong Er and human-Bald Qiang who happened to defend their forest homes. Struggle story. Xiong Da is the backbone of the Xiong brothers. He is smarter, witty, able to respond to changes, and can come up with ideas; Xiong Er has a straightforward personality, ignorant and cute, impulsive, and straight-line thinking; the two bearsâ€™ biggest enemy has a strong bald head and a short stature. Lumberjack who robbed and felled. This part mainly describes the spring-related stories found between Xiong Da Xiong Er and Bald Qiang in the spring forest, such as flower viewing, arbor day, hay fever, etc., in order to prevent Bald Qiang from destroying the forest and defend his home. , The jungle animals headed by Xiong Da Xiong II and Bald Qiang continued their struggle to defend the forest.
